radiographic_examinations.findings: Suprasellar mass with nodular enhancement involving the upper pituitary stalk and hypothalamus and an enhancing nodule in the left cerebellar hemisphere.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: The lesion in the left cerebellar hemisphere enlarged slightly compared with the previous MRI.

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: CT of the chest, abdomen, and pelvis
radiographic_examinations.findings: Sclerotic foci in the right humeral head, several thoracic vertebral bodies, and the iliac wings; fullness of the renal collecting systems; no lymphadenopathy.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Increased soft tissue extending around the aorta and surrounding the kidneys, mild bilateral hydronephrosis noted in the most recent scan.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Mucosal thickening in the right frontal and ethmoid sinuses and sclerotic areas within the calvaria; no abnormalities seen in the brain.

radiographic_examinations.date: One month after starting prednisone therapy
radiographic_examinations.findings: Cerebellar and neurohypophyseal lesions had decreased slightly in size compared to earlier MRI study.

radiographic_examinations.date: Eight months before the current evaluation
radiographic_examinations.findings: Expansile enhancing process involving the infundibular recess of the third ventricle and pituitary stalk; mildly enhancing rounded lesion in the medial left cerebellum.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: MRI scans of the brain were unchanged from five months earlier.

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: CT of the chest and upper abdomen
radiographic_examinations.findings: Slight prominence of both kidneys, bilat - eral perinephric stranding, small amount of fluid noted around the aorta; sclerotic foci in multiple vertebrae.
Length of right kidney was 12.1 cm and left was 10.9 cm; bilateral grade 2 hydronephrosis; no renal masses, cysts, or stones seen.

radiographic_examinations.date: One year before the current evaluation
radiographic_examinations.findings: No changes noted in the lesions.

radiographic_examinations.date: Three months before the current evaluation
One month later after previous evaluation
radiographic_examinations.findings: Slight enlargement of the left cerebellar lesion (1.8 cm), otherwise unchanged.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: The left cerebellar lesion had enlarged slightly compared to three months earlier.

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: CT of the chest, abdomen, and pelvis
radiographic_examinations.findings: Increased soft tissue extending from the left subclavian artery to the descending thoracic and abdominal aorta; mild bilateral hydronephrosis.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Abnormal tissue surrounding the aorta and kidneys was noted in earlier studies, but with less striking findings.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Osteoporosis of the lumbar spine and slightly low bone density at the femoral neck.
